definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: French type designer known for establishing the roman-style letter as the standard in printing.
sentences.chinese: 被認可的兩種摔跤項目是古典式和自由式摔跤。

sentences.english: Freestyle dancing can be very self-expressive.
sentences.chinese: 自由式舞蹈可以非常自我表現。

sentences.english: Freestyle will also offer best-in-class second and third row legroom.
sentences.chinese: 自由式也將提供最好的一流的第二和第三排腿部空間。

sentences.english: I can do the crawl, and I'm learning the backstroke and breaststroke.
sentences.chinese: 我會遊自由式，而且我現在正在學仰式和蛙式。

sentences.english: Freestyle wrestling was first introduced in the Olympic Games of 1904.
sentences.chinese: 自由式摔跤首次在1904年的奧運會上出現。

sentences.english: If you are going to be spending your time in the half-pipe a freestyle board is best for you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你將要花費你的時間在半管一自由式板最適合你。

sentences.english: The trick to freestyle breakdancing is following both the beat and melody of the music.
sentences.chinese: 對自由式霹靂訣竅就是以下兩個節拍和音樂旋律。

sentences.english: The trio of swimmers each won medals in the freestyle and backstroke categories.
sentences.chinese: 三位游泳健將分別都得到了自由式以及仰式的獎牌。

sentences.english: Can he teach me the butterfly and the backstroke?
sentences.chinese: 他還能教你自由式和蛙式。

sentences.english: The two recognized styles of wrestling are Grero-Roman and free style.
sentences.chinese: 被認可的兩種摔跤項目是古典式和自由式摔跤。

sentences.english: I'm best at the crawl, but I enjoy the breast stroke, too.
sentences.chinese: 我最擅長自由式，但也喜歡蛙式。

definition: stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
